name: StepX
description: The most popular music game is now available on steam. The easiest way to realize your musical ideas is with just a few mouse clicks. In front of you is a panel with notes with different musical instruments. You can adjust the tempo, volume, tonality. You can import and export your creations.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: DualCore CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: any Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: any Storage: 100 MB available space
